Introduction


Luna Pirates (Korean: 루나파이럿츠; Japanese: ルナパイロッツ) is a South Korean EDM band under OTO Records consisting of three members: Goo Taehoon, Mad Queen and OGon. They officially debuted on June 12, 2018 with the single album Shine. They’re the first EDM band in South Korea.
